Special Powers

January 7, 2021
GL_Alex
This is a shining star in the Fast Forces pack. You have to include her on Defender teams. She is cheap and she will hang in there with her "Bet on Black" SP.
October 3, 2020
mc268
This is my new favourite Black Cat. They took most of the Deadpool UC (defenders, six clicks, high mobility, damage potential) and added in an improved version of the damage power from the Superior Foes version. The leap climb/improved movement combo is weird, but it doesn’t bother me because usually Felicia just has stealth on the dial for most of her movement powers, now it’s traited. She also has some great new tricks, perplex is amazing for her Spidey team mates, exploit and precision strike allow her to be a threat, and she picks up sidestep later on. The defensive power track is also really good and thematic, and her trait helps augment her defenses. Her combat values are solid for the cost as 0well. The lack of direct prob means my Deadpool version isn’t just obsolete. This set did remakes of certain characters very well: familiar dials for characters, that are different enough to justify getting, and keeping your old version.
September 15, 2020

L/C with Improved Movement: E/H? Yeah there are a few opportunities for that, but charge on those clix would have been better.
